posts.message:
I just published a blog post: "Flattening, or the quest to procedurally generating low poly art because my artistic skills are non existent"

You may find it interesting if you like #programming, #graphics, #proceduralGeneration, #lowpoly art or... well... you have some free time :)

Feedback is always welcome :)

Diaa Sami & Ahmed Al-Amir might probably recognise this piece from before but hey... at least i moved to a more stable blog now :D

posts.message:
بما إن فيه ناس كتير بدأت تكتب خبرتها في الإنترفيوهات مع الشركات الكبري، حبيت إنقل خبرتي مع مايكروسوفت. هو اه البوستات ديه عمرها أكتر من 10 سنين (و فيها أخطاء إملائية ملهاش نهاية أيام مكان الإنجليزي بتاعي لسة بعافية شوية)، بس أهو، يمكن تنفع حد. لو موضوع انها بالإنجليزي دة عامل مشكلة، ممكن أترجمها.

posts.message:
Git Merge event will be streamed live for those interested. Their official description says: "Git Merge will feature sessions on using Git, scaling Git, and developing on Git from core Git maintainers."

Stream link: https://live-stream.github.com/
posts.caption: git-merge.com
posts.description: Git Merge will feature sessions on using Git, scaling Git, and developing on Git from core Git maintainers. This April we will be getting together at La Gaîté lyrique in Paris' 3rd arrondissement and wish Git a happy 10th birthday.

posts.message:
1024 colours on a CGA display

mind blowing awesomeness :D
#demoscene
posts.caption: reenigne.org
posts.description: When displaying graphics on an original IBM Color Graphics Adapter (CGA), normally only 4 colours (from a palette of 16) are possible at once. A few games written for such systems took advantage of the artifacting on the card's NTSC composite output to get 16 colours at once. On Saturday, a team of…

posts.message: Here's a gem I've built. It's a Rails gallery engine. It says it's downloaded 444 times so far, and I've just uploaded it yesterday. Are these numbers correct ? Or there's some kind of bots that download the gem and test or or something ?
posts.caption: rubygems.org
posts.description: "A Rails gallery engine. Includes creating multiple galleries and photos. Multi uploading and cropping. Can extend gallery and photo model or controller. Configurable through yml configuration file."
